name: papercups_rasa_integration
description: papercups webhook for communication with  rasa chatbot

scripts.deploy: docker run --rm -e AWS_LAMBDA_FUNCTION_NAME=webhook -e DOCKER_LAMBDA_STAY_OPEN=1 -e DOCKER_LAMBDA_WATCH=1 -p 9001:9001 -v $PWD:/var/task:ro,delegated lambci/lambda:nodejs12.x handler.handler
